summary: This bill, the Daniel J. Harvey, Jr. and Adam Lambert Improving Servicemember Transition to Reduce Veteran Suicide Act, aims to improve the Transition Assistance Program (TAP) and Solid Start Program for veterans. It focuses on addressing mental health issues by providing information on mental health services, treatment for conditions like PTSD and depression, suicide risk factors, substance abuse resources, and the stressors of separation from the Armed Forces. It also requires a joint report from the Secretaries of Defense and Veterans Affairs to relevant congressional committees.
